name: Pinnacle 12 Liter Hydration Race Vest - Men’s

features: 20% lighter than the Howe and Krar
Two water-resistant pockets on chest for phone and pill pocket with whistle
New Kangaroo pockets: one side entry easy access pocket. One vertical pocket for trekking poles, larger items
New Shape of vest that sits longer in the back for dispersed capacity
Large diagonal zipper for easy entry for necessities of any size that fits
Tapered back panels for a chimney wicking effect, designed to wick moisture up and out of sweaty locations.
